Monster.Name: Knight
Monster.Description: Knights are warriors who pledge service to rulers, religious orders, and noble causes. A knightâ€™s alignment determines the extent to which a pledge is honored. Whether undertaking a quest or patrolling a realm, a knight often travels with an entourage that includes squires and hirelings who are commoners.

MonsterTrait.Name: Brave
MonsterTrait.Text: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The knight makes two melee attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Greatsword
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Heavy Crossbow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
MonsterTrait.Text: For 1 minute, the knight can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the knight is incapacitated.

MonsterTrait.Name: Parry
MonsterTrait.Text: The knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
